title: The Tribes East of the Jordan
summary: Reuben, Gad, and the half-tribe of Manasseh are detailed here. Though Reuben was the firstborn, his rights were given to Joseph. The tribes had strong warriors but later were unfaithful and exiled by Assyria.

faq.question: Why didn’t Reuben retain his birthright?
faq.answer: Because he dishonored his father, so the rights were passed to Joseph’s line.

faq.question: What happened to these eastern tribes?
faq.answer: They were exiled because of their unfaithfulness to God.
